item.title: Thursday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 climbed to a fresh record close — its 12th of 2025 — as traders hoped for trade deals. Here's what's on CNBC's radar going into Thursday.

item.title: Meme screen: Heavily shorted small stocks that are starting to rip this week
item.description: CNBC ran a screen of U.S. stocks to find the next meme names with characteristics such as elevated levels of short interest and low stock price.

item.title: The energy sector has been lagging, but Wolfe says this dividend payer is about to break out
item.description: The energy sector has been underperforming the broader market, but one dividend-paying name has been on a hot streak.

item.title: Morgan Stanley's highest conviction picks into earnings
item.description: Take a look at five of Morgan Stanley's 13 highest conviction plays ahead of corporate earnings reports.

item.title: This oil ETF is showing signs of a possible turnaround, according to the charts
item.description: Frank Cappelleri breaks down an oil services ETF.
